actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976, relating to the authority of the Secretary of the Interior to accept volunteer services in the aid of the work of the Bureau of Land Management, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 to allow the Secretary of the Interior to recruit the services of volunteers to facilitate the activities of the Bureau of Land Management. Prohibits the use of such volunteers in firefighting, law enforcement work, policymaking processes, or to displace an employee. Authorizes the Secretary to provide for costs incidental to the use of volunteers. Declares that such volunteers shall not be deemed Federal employees except for purposes of tort claims or compensation for work injuries.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976, relating to the authority of the Secretary of the Interior to accept volunteer services in the aid of the work of the Bureau of Land Management, and for other purposes.
